summary: Adds Dread Knight Weapon Set to the game.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/2056/dk01title.jpg[/img]


[color=red][b]NEW MOD RELEASED: DEMON HUNTER ARMOR by Jojjo and GraceDarkling and zzjay:[/color][/b]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42169/?tab=2&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D42169&pUp=1



[youtube]ckSYR3tdcHs[/youtube]
[color=lime]Thanks, Mack!
And all the modders around through all the years!
\"Baptized in blood and fear\" was written on the steel. [/color]

[youtube]rHwVnsRNvzw[/youtube]
[color=lime]Thanks to MMOxReview![/color]

[youtube]hwSOdwZUDP8[/youtube]
[color=lime]Thanks to Brodual![/color]

[youtube]k3EB6S0txmU[/youtube]
[color=lime]Thanks to xitzphilgx![/color]

[img]http://img716.imageshack.us/img716/3421/dk02description.jpg[/img]
Adds Dread Knight Weapon Set to the game.
It\'s a weapon set I made once for Oblivion but now imported and retextured anew for Skyrim.
All the meshes and textures were made from scratch.
Content:
Bow (my first bow ever)
Sword
Greatsword
Axe
Battleaxe
Mace
Warhammer
Dagger

[img]http://img837.imageshack.us/img837/1737/dk03requirements.jpg[/img]
Required other mods - none. Maybe patched game.

[img]http://img51.imageshack.us/img51/8347/dk04location.jpg[/img]
Actually there are two sets - one forgable and upgradable (Ebony equivalent) and other non-forgable upgradable (Daedric equivalent).
- The normal set you can forge at any forge - ebony section. Ebony smithing skill required.
- The Superb set you can find in Folgunthur (Crypt) located southeast of Solitude. Look for a chest next to the Word Wall.
You\'ll have to fight for it but the prize is free of charge (the one-handed weapons comes in pairs for the dual-wielders).

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/6784/dk05install.jpg[/img]
Extract the archive. Take the folders \"meshes\", \"textures\" and Dread Knight Weapon Set.esp and paste\'em in your Skyrim/Data folder. \"Yes to all\" when/if asked. In Skyrim Launcher go to Data Files and activate Dread Knight Weapon Set.

[img]http://img837.imageshack.us/img837/3785/dk06uninstall.jpg[/img]
Uncheck Dread Knight Weapon Set in Skyrim Launcher Data Files.
Delete:
- Dread Knight Weapon Set.esp from your Data folder
- Skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\weapons\\dreadknight folder
- Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\weapons\\dreadknight folder

[img]http://img687.imageshack.us/img687/7979/dk07credits.jpg[/img]
Thanks to [color=lime][b]Bethesda[/color][/b] for the best games and the Creation Kit.
Thanks to [color=lime][b]Nicoroshi[/color][/b] for the invaluable help when I was stucked with the bow import. Best of luck, brother!

Tools Used
==========
Tes4bsa
3ds Studio Max
NIFSkope
Photoshop
Creation Kit

[img]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/4545/dk08permissions.jpg[/img]
This mod was created only for using here on skyrim.nexusmods.com. Contact me before doing anything new with the stuff.
author: jojjo
